Baringo, T
Duque Gallo, J J
Borau, M J
Ros, L
Yarza, J C
Ramírez, R
Ascaso, A
metadata.dc:description: A group of 122 breast cancer patients, 42 of them with bone metastases are studied, and the role of the radioisotopic whole body scanning and the serial skeletal radiography are considered.
metadata.dc:title: El rastreo isotópico en el diagnóstico de las metástasis oseas del cáncer de mama. Estudio comparativo con la radiología y la clínica.
[Isotopic scanning in the diagnosis of bone metastases of breast cancer. Comparative study with radiologic and clinical observations].
